question.title: Tomcat fails to start due to error in tomcat-users.xml configuration
question.body:
yesterday tomcat was working properly in my machine on eclipse , today tomcat failed to start even tho i didn't change anything

i was trying to run my JEE project on the tomcat server but it failed to run and then i tried to run the tomcat server alone after that i closed the project and it still doesn't run , and when i wanted to check for probelms there were an error in the settings file tomcat-users.xml the error is cvc-elt.1.a: Cannot find the declaration of element 'tomcat-users'. the general configuration what's in the settings file
